content.html: Nobody will remember: - Your salary - Your fancy title - How ‘busy’ you were - How stressed you were - How many hours you worked People will remember: - Your name - Your works - Your shattered visage - Your trunkless legs
content.value:
Nobody will remember:
- Your salary
- Your fancy title
- How ‘busy’ you were
- How stressed you were
- How many hours you worked 

People will remember: 
- Your name
- Your works
- Your shattered visage
- Your trunkless legs
